title: Visa partners with Skill India to upskill 20,000 youths for tourism industry
description: Visa and the Tourism & Hospitality Skill Council (THSC) have agreed to a three-year partnership worth up to USD 1 million to train at least 20,000 Indian youths in tourism-related skills. The initiative, involving the Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship, targets youths in 10 states to enhance tourism services in India.
